main event: A father and son witnessed an unidentified disc-shaped object in the sky near McMinnville, Tennessee, on May 31, 1967.
interesting points: The object was approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter and metallic silver in color,It exhibited side-to-side motion and sometimes seemed to disappear,The father took several photographs, although they were not included in this report,There were other celestial bodies visible at the time, such as Jupiter and Venus,The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes.
witness description: A father who is a photographer and his son.
